<span style="font-size: 42px; font-family: 'Georgia', sans-serif;">**Jackson R. Strand**</span><br>
Welcome! I am a PhD student in Ecology & Environmental Sciences at Montana State University with research interests in applied entomology, invasive species management, and sustainable ecosystem restoration. My work broadly examines plantâ€“insect interactions and the role of biological control in integrated pest management, with the goal of developing strategies that support resilient landscapes and long-term conservation outcomes.  

On this site you can find my [CV](#education), summaries of current and past [research projects](qmd/research/research.qmd), [media resources](qmd/media/media.qmd), [field notes](qmd/projects/field_notes/fieldjournal.qmd) from my current PhD work, and a collection of [tools and guides](qmd/helpful/helpful.qmd) I have accumulated for students and collaborators.
